dishes.name: Chickennn Pizza
dishes.description: Chicken Pizza is prepared with tender chicken pieces layered over a tangy tomato baseeee.

dishes.name: Paneer Pizza
dishes.description: Paneer Pizza is a vegetarian favorite with soft paneer cubes and vegetables.

dishes.name: Cheese Pizza
dishes.description: Cheese Pizza focuses on pure comfort with a rich cheese layer.

dishes.name: Chicken Burger
dishes.description: Juicy chicken patty seasoned with aromatic spices delivers a rich, savory bite in every mouthful. Crispy on the outside and tender inside, it offers the perfect balance of crunch and softness. Fresh lettuce and creamy sauce add a refreshing contrast to the bold flavors. Soft toasted buns hold everything together beautifully. A satisfying choice for chicken lovers craving comfort and indulgence.

dishes.name: Veg Burger
dishes.description: A wholesome vegetable patty made from fresh garden vegetables creates a light yet flavorful experience. Mild spices enhance the natural taste without overpowering it. Crisp lettuce and tangy sauce add freshness and balance. Served in a soft toasted bun, it feels both healthy and filling. Perfect for those who enjoy clean, comforting flavors.

dishes.name: Paneer Burger
dishes.description: Soft, grilled paneer brings a rich and creamy texture to every bite. Light spices and herbs enhance its natural milkiness. Paired with crunchy vegetables, it creates a delightful contrast of textures. A smooth, mildly spiced sauce ties the flavors together. Ideal for vegetarians who enjoy a luxurious, protein-rich burger.

dishes.name: Cheese Burger
dishes.description: Melted cheese blankets the patty, creating a smooth and indulgent flavor profile. Each bite delivers a rich, creamy taste that feels comforting and satisfying. The warmth of the cheese pairs perfectly with fresh toppings. Soft buns enhance the overall melt-in-the-mouth experience. A timeless classic made for true cheese lovers.

dishes.name: Spicy Burger
dishes.description: Bold spices ignite the palate with an exciting burst of heat. The patty is infused with fiery flavors that build with every bite. Cooling sauces and fresh vegetables balance the intensity perfectly. The soft bun absorbs the spice while keeping the burger hearty. A must-try for those who love strong, adventurous flavors.

ingredients.name: Mozzarella Cheese
ingredients.description: Mozzarella is a soft, creamy cheese known for its mild flavor and excellent melting quality.
ingredients.history: Mozzarella originated in Italy and became globally popular through pizza.

ingredients.name: Tomato Sauce
ingredients.description: Tomato sauce provides a tangy, savory base for many dishes.
ingredients.history: Introduced to Europe in the 16th century and became central to Italian cuisine.
